SENT.plain: We report a case of tongue cancer presenting with SSD type brain embolism induced by chemotherapy with CBDCA and 5-FU (CF Therapy) A 35-year-old woman underwent CF therapy for squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue
Immediately after CF therapy, aphasia and serious exercise paralysis appeared
However, symptoms disappeared 2 days later and no abnormality was found by brain CT
We report that SSD type brain embolism is one of the noteworthy side effects of CF therapy
